items.sentence: My mother is two years younger than my father.
I\'ve learned to speak French a little better.
I\'ve made a list of people I need to talk to.
I\'ve made up my mind to ask Mary to marry me.
We have a few more hours before Tom gets here.
We have far better things to do with our time.
We have no choice but to eat this moldy bread.
We have to figure out where Tom hid his money.
Tom had Mary translate the letter into French.
Tom had no idea that Mary was already married.
